titleStmt.title: The jus divinum of government; or Magistracy proved to be God's ordinance, and justice the magistrates duty. In a plain sermon preached before the judges of assize at East-Grinstead in the County of Sussex. By Zacheus Mountagu.
titleStmt.author: [Mountagu, Zacheus].

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Abel Roper at the sign of the Sun over against St Dunstans-Church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
